Welcome to Unicon

Explore the genius

Collaboration

With Unicon, students can collaborate on ideas, share resources, find rides to share and can overall improve their learning experience by not only participating but also by getting an exposure with students having complementary skill sets.

Resources

Unicon provides an easy and convenient way to share resources with other students. These students can be inter-department and can have same or different skill set. Now, students can find all the resources that interests them at one place.

Ideas

Unicon has a unique idea platform, which not only provides the ideas on which student wants to work on but also the eligible collaborators. Now, students can easily choose the entrepreneur path and can work on ideas with students having different streams of studies.

Rideshare

Rideshare solves the problem of sharing a ride among students. It removes all the hassle of ride search and booking by keeping it between the students. It is the most convenient and efficient way to travel with other students.
